mapper.sql: monthagent . id , monthagent.yearid, monthagent.unitid, monthagent.monthid, monthagent.m, monthagent.total, monthagent.agenttype, monthagent.subjectid, monthagent.name, monthagent.elasticflag, monthagent.elasticmax, monthagent.elasticratio, monthagent.budgetsubjectid, monthagent.remark, monthagent.productid, monthagent.addmoney, monthagent.lendoutmoney, monthagent.lendinmoney, monthagent.executemoney, monthagent.createtime, monthagent.updatetime, monthagent.yearagentid, monthagent.monthbusiness, yearAgent.total as yearagentmoney, yearAgent.addmoney as yearaddmoney, yearAgent.lendinmoney as yearlendinmoney, yearAgent.lendoutmoney as yearlendoutmoney, yearAgent.executemoney as yearexecutemoney, (yearAgent.total + yearAgent.addmoney + yearAgent.lendinmoney - yearAgent.lendoutmoney - yearAgent.executemoney) AS unExecute, (yearAgent.total + yearAgent.addmoney + yearAgent.lendinmoney) AS yearMoneyTotal,
mapper.select:
SELECT
month_.period as period, _unitend.requeststatus as requestStatus FROM budget_month_agent AS monthagent INNER JOIN budget_month_end_unit _unitend ON monthagent.yearid = _unitend.yearid AND monthagent.unitid = _unitend.unitid AND monthagent.monthid = _unitend.monthid INNER JOIN budget_subject AS mysubject ON monthagent.subjectid = mysubject.id AND monthagent.yearid = mysubject.yearid INNER JOIN budget_month_period month_ ON month_.id = monthagent.monthid INNER JOIN budget_year_agent yearAgent on monthagent.yearagentid = yearAgent.id WHERE monthagent.unitid = #{budgetUnitId} and monthagent.subjectid = #{budgetSubjectId} and monthagent.monthid = #{monthId}
and monthagent.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by monthagent.createtime desc

SELECT
cate.name as productCate, product.name as productName, month_.period as period, _unitend.requeststatus as requestStatus FROM budget_month_agent AS monthagent INNER JOIN budget_month_end_unit _unitend ON monthagent.yearid = _unitend.yearid AND monthagent.unitid = _unitend.unitid AND monthagent.monthid = _unitend.monthid INNER JOIN budget_subject AS mysubject ON monthagent.subjectid = mysubject.id AND monthagent.yearid = mysubject.yearid INNER JOIN budget_month_period month_ ON month_.id = monthagent.monthid INNER JOIN budget_product product ON product.id = monthagent.productid INNER JOIN budget_product_category cate ON product.procategoryid = cate.id INNER JOIN budget_year_agent yearAgent on monthagent.yearagentid = yearAgent.id WHERE monthagent.unitid = #{budgetUnitId} and monthagent.subjectid = #{budgetSubjectId} and monthagent.monthid = #{monthId}
and monthagent.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by monthagent.createtime desc

SELECT
month_.period as period, unit_.name as unitName FROM budget_month_agent AS monthagent INNER JOIN budget_subject AS mysubject ON monthagent.subjectid = mysubject.id AND monthagent.yearid = mysubject.yearid INNER JOIN budget_month_period month_ ON month_.id = monthagent.monthid INNER JOIN budget_unit unit_ ON unit_.id = monthagent.unitid INNER JOIN budget_year_agent yearAgent on monthagent.yearagentid = yearAgent.id WHERE monthagent.subjectid = #{budgetSubjectId} and monthagent.monthid = #{monthId}
and monthagent.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by monthagent.createtime desc

select (select ifnull(sum(d.reimmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_detail d, budget_reimbursementorder o where o.id = d.reimbursementid and o.yearid = t.yearid and o.unitid = t.unitid and d.reimflag = 1 and d.monthagentid = m.id and o.reuqeststatus > 0) as bxMoney, (select ifnull(sum(a.allocatedmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_allocated a, budget_reimbursementorder o where o.id = a.reimbursementid and o.yearid = t.yearid and o.unitid = t.unitid and a.reimflag = 1 and a.monthagentid = m.id and o.reuqeststatus > 0) as hbMoney from budget_year_agent t left join budget_month_agent m on t.id = m.yearagentid where t.id = #{yearAgentId} and m.monthid != #{monthId}

SELECT _subject.name as subjectName, _unit.name as unitName, monthPeriod.period, monthAgent.total, monthAgent.monthbusiness, yearAgent.total + yearAgent.addmoney + yearAgent.lendinmoney - yearAgent.lendoutmoney - yearAgent.executemoney AS unExecute FROM budget_unit_subject _unitsubject INNER JOIN budget_subject _subject ON _unitsubject.subjectid = _subject.id INNER JOIN budget_unit _unit ON _unit.id = _unitsubject.unitid AND _unit.yearid = _subject.yearid INNER JOIN budget_month_agent monthAgent ON monthAgent.yearid = _subject.yearid AND monthAgent.unitid = _unit.id AND monthAgent.subjectid = _subject.id INNER JOIN budget_month_period monthPeriod ON monthPeriod.id = monthAgent.monthid INNER JOIN budget_year_agent yearAgent ON yearAgent.id = monthAgent.yearagentid WHERE _subject.id in ( SELECT _subject.id FROM budget_unit_subject _unitsubject INNER JOIN budget_subject _subject ON _unitsubject.subjectid = _subject.id WHERE _subject.costsplitflag = 1 AND _unitsubject.splitflag = 1 AND _subject.leafflag = 1 AND _unitsubject.unitid = #{budgetUnitId}) AND monthAgent.monthid = #{monthId}

select t.name, t.total, t.addmoney, t.lendinmoney, t.lendoutmoney, (select ifnull(sum(d.reimmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_detail d, budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent bma,budget_year_agent bya where o.id = d.reimbursementid and d.reimflag = 1 and d.monthagentid = bma.id and bma.yearagentid = bya.id and bya.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 2 and o.yearid = t.yearid and o.unitid = t.unitid) as bxmoney, (select ifnull(sum(d.reimmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_detail d, budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent bma,budget_year_agent bya where o.id = d.reimbursementid and d.reimflag = 1 and d.monthagentid = bma.id and bma.yearagentid = bya.id and bya.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 1 and o.yearid = t.yearid and o.unitid = t.unitid) as sdmoney, (select ifnull(sum(a.allocatedmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_allocated a, budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent bma,budget_year_agent bya where o.id = a.reimbursementid and a.reimflag = 1 and a.monthagentid = bma.id and bma.yearagentid = bya.id and bya.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 2 and o.yearid = t.yearid and a.unitid = t.unitid) as hbmoney, (select ifnull(sum(a.allocatedmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_allocated a, budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent bma,budget_year_agent bya where o.id = a.reimbursementid and a.reimflag = 1 and a.monthagentid = bma.id and bma.yearagentid = bya.id and bya.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 1 and o.yearid = t.yearid and a.unitid = t.unitid) as hbsdmoney from budget_year_agent t where t.yearid = #{bean.yearId} and t.unitid = #{bean.unitId} and t.id = (SELECT yearagentid from budget_month_agent where id = #{bean.monthAgentId})

select t.name, t.total, t.addmoney, t.lendinmoney, t.lendoutmoney, (select ifnull(sum(d.reimmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_detail d, budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent bma,budget_year_agent bya where o.id = d.reimbursementid and d.reimflag = 1 and d.monthagentid = bma.id and bma.yearagentid = bya.id and bya.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 2 and o.yearid = t.yearid and o.unitid = t.unitid) as bxmoney, (select ifnull(sum(d.reimmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_detail d, budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent bma,budget_year_agent bya where o.id = d.reimbursementid and d.reimflag = 1 and d.monthagentid = bma.id and bma.yearagentid = bya.id and bya.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 1 and o.yearid = t.yearid and o.unitid = t.unitid) as sdmoney, (select ifnull(sum(a.allocatedmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_allocated a, budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent bma,budget_year_agent bya where o.id = a.reimbursementid and a.reimflag = 1 and a.monthagentid = bma.id and bma.yearagentid = bya.id and bya.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 2 and o.yearid = t.yearid and a.unitid = t.unitid) as hbmoney, (select ifnull(sum(a.allocatedmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_allocated a, budget_reimbursementorder o,budget_month_agent bma,budget_year_agent bya where o.id = a.reimbursementid and a.reimflag = 1 and a.monthagentid = bma.id and bma.yearagentid = bya.id and bya.id = t.id and o.reuqeststatus = 1 and o.yearid = t.yearid and a.unitid = t.unitid) as hbsdmoney from budget_year_agent t where t.yearid = #{bean.yearId} and t.unitid = #{bean.unitId} and t.id = #{bean.yearAgentId}

select sum(t.total) as total, sum(t.addmoney) as addmoney, sum(t.lendinmoney) as lendinmoney, sum(t.lendoutmoney) as lendoutmoney, t.subjectid as subjectId, (select ifnull(sum(dd.reimmoney),0) from budget_reimbursementorder_detail dd, budget_month_agent tt, budget_reimbursementorder o where o.id = dd.reimbursementid and o.yearid = t.yearid and o.unitid = t.unitid and o.monthid = t.monthid and dd.reimflag = 1 and o.reuqeststatus = 2 and tt.subjectid = t.subjectid and tt.yearid = t.yearid and tt.unitid = t.unitid and tt.monthid = t.monthid and dd.monthagentid = tt.id) as bxmoney, (select ifnull(sum(dd.reimmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_detail dd, budget_month_agent tt, budget_reimbursementorder o where o.id = dd.reimbursementid and o.yearid = t.yearid and o.unitid = t.unitid and o.monthid = t.monthid and dd.reimflag = 1 and o.reuqeststatus = 1 and tt.subjectid = t.subjectid and tt.yearid = t.yearid and tt.unitid = t.unitid and tt.monthid = t.monthid and dd.monthagentid = tt.id) as sdmoney, (select ifnull(sum(dd.allocatedmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_allocated dd, budget_month_agent tt, budget_reimbursementorder o where o.id = dd.reimbursementid and o.yearid = t.yearid and dd.unitid = t.unitid and o.monthid = t.monthid and dd.reimflag = 1 and o.reuqeststatus = 2 and tt.subjectid = t.subjectid and tt.yearid = t.yearid and tt.unitid = t.unitid and tt.monthid = t.monthid and dd.monthagentid = tt.id) as hbmoney, (select ifnull(sum(d.allocatedmoney), 0) from budget_reimbursementorder_allocated d where d.monthagentid in (select dd.monthagentid from budget_reimbursementorder_allocated dd, budget_month_agent tt, budget_reimbursementorder o where o.id = dd.reimbursementid and o.yearid = t.yearid and dd.unitid = t.unitid and o.monthid = t.monthid and dd.reimflag = 1 and o.reuqeststatus = 1 and tt.subjectid = t.subjectid and tt.yearid = t.yearid and tt.unitid = t.unitid and tt.monthid = t.monthid and dd.monthagentid = tt.id)) as hbsdmoney from budget_month_agent t where t.yearid = #{bean.yearId} and t.unitid = #{bean.unitId} and t.monthid = #{bean.monthId} and t.subjectid in (select ag.subjectid from budget_month_agent ag where ag.id = #{bean.monthAgentId} and ag.yearid = t.yearid and ag.unitid = t.unitid) group by t.subjectid

select brd.reimmoney from budget_reimbursementorder bxorder, budget_reimbursementorder_detail brd, budget_month_agent ma where brd.reimbursementid = bxorder.id and bxorder.reuqeststatus = 1 and brd.reimflag = 1 and brd.monthagentid = ma.id and ma.yearagentid = #{yearAgentId}

select brd.allocatedmoney from budget_reimbursementorder bxorder, budget_reimbursementorder_allocated brd, budget_month_agent ma where brd.reimbursementid = bxorder.id and bxorder.reuqeststatus = 1 and brd.monthagentid = ma.id and ma.yearagentid = #{yearAgentId}

select monthAgent.id AS monthAgentId, monthAgent.subjectid AS subjectId, monthAgent.name AS name, yearAgent.total AS yearMoney, monthAgent.total AS monthMoney, (yearAgent.total + yearAgent.addmoney + yearAgent.lendinmoney - yearAgent.lendoutmoney - yearAgent.executemoney) AS yearBalance, monthAgent.total AS preMonthMoney, (monthAgent.total + monthAgent.addmoney + monthAgent.lendinmoney - monthAgent.lendoutmoney - monthAgent.executemoney) AS preMonthBalance from budget_month_agent monthAgent left join budget_year_agent yearAgent on monthAgent.yearagentid = yearAgent.id where monthAgent.id = #{monthAgentId}

SELECT monthagent.id AS agentId, monthagent.`name` AS agentName, budgetsubject.`name` AS subjectName, monthsubject.total AS monthMoney, (monthsubject.total + monthsubject.addmoney + monthsubject.lendinmoney - monthsubject.lendoutmoney - monthsubject.executemoney) AS monthBalance, yearagent.total AS yearMoney, (yearagent.total + yearagent.addmoney + yearagent.lendinmoney - yearagent.lendoutmoney - yearagent.executemoney) AS yearBalance, monthagent.remark AS remark FROM budget_month_agent AS monthagent INNER JOIN budget_subject AS budgetsubject ON monthagent.subjectid = budgetsubject.id AND monthagent.yearid = budgetsubject.yearid INNER JOIN budget_month_subject AS monthsubject ON monthsubject.unitid = monthagent.unitid AND monthsubject.subjectid = monthagent.subjectid AND monthsubject.monthid = monthagent.monthid INNER JOIN budget_year_agent AS yearagent ON yearagent.unitid = monthagent.unitid AND yearagent.subjectid = budgetsubject.id AND monthagent.yearagentid = yearagent.id AND monthagent.yearid = yearagent.yearid AND monthagent.unitid = yearagent.unitid INNER JOIN budget_month_end_unit endmonth ON monthagent.yearid = endmonth.yearid AND monthagent.unitid = endmonth.unitid AND monthagent.monthid = endmonth.monthid WHERE endmonth.monthendflag = 0 AND budgetsubject.assistflag = 0 AND monthagent.yearid = #{yearId} AND monthagent.unitid = #{budgetUnitId} AND monthagent.monthid = #{monthId} AND monthagent.`name` = '绩效奖' ORDER BY budgetsubject.orderno
